abstract: Marion 'Suge' Knight, former rap mogul of Death Row Records, is arrested on murder charges after allegedly running down two men in Los Angeles parking lot and then leaving the scene; one of the men died, and the second was hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: Marion Knight, who helped found Death Row Records and is better known as Suge, was arrested and charged with murder after the police said he struck two men with his truck.

byline.original: By JOE COSCARELLI and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS

snippet: Marion Knight, who helped found Death Row Records and is better known as Suge, was arrested and charged with murder after the police said he struck two men with his truck.

headline.main: Fallen Hip-Hop Mogul Is Charged With Killing a Man He Struck With His Vehicle
headline.print_headline: Fallen Hip-Hop Mogul Is Charged With Killing a Man He Struck With His Vehicle
